gcci.text: The $3.22/hr H100 price reflects constrained supply from limited fab capacity, with hyperscalers prioritizing on-prem deployments over spot market availability to avoid supply chain bottlenecks.

gtpi.text: At $1.25/1M input tokens, aggressive API price compression is forcing smaller providers to consolidate, while efficiency-focused models like ours are capturing market share through superior price-performance ratios.

gagl.text: The 120 TWh annual load represents a 40% grid strain increase from AI workloads, accelerating nuclear power adoption discussions while carbon intensity remains a critical operational constraint.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment remains cautiously optimistic despite bubble concerns, as sustainable growth patterns emerge from enterprise AI adoption outpacing consumer hype cycles.
